alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 3:11AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM EARLY SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of up to 2 to 8 inches between 5000 and 7000 feet elevation, 8 to 18 inches above 7000 feet, and 19 to 24 inches near peaks possible. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...From early Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact mountain roads.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
